content.title: NEET/JEE Coaching For Tribal Students
content.details: The NEET/JEE Coaching for Tribal Students Scheme is a government initiative launched by the Rajasthan Tribal Area Development Department to provide free coaching to tribal students in the state who are preparing for the National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET) and Joint Entrance Examination (JEE). The aim of the scheme is to help talented tribal students in Rajasthan to get admission to prestigious medical and engineering colleges in India by providing them with high-quality coaching. Under the scheme, the Rajasthan government has partnered with reputed coaching institutes to provide free coaching to eligible tribal students. The coaching includes intensive classroom sessions, doubt clearing sessions, study materials, and mock tests. The coaching institutes also provide guidance and mentorship to students to help them develop a better understanding of the subjects and excel in the exams.
benefits: Reimbursement of institute fees up to Rs. 55,000.
Provision of Rs. 1,000 per month for food and accommodation.
Full coverage of stationary expenses, amounting to Rs. 5,000 one-time.
eligibility: Have successfully completed 12th grade in the science stream with a first-class standing.
documents_required: Education Qualification Marksheet / Certificate Copy: 12th marksheet

faqs.question: Who can apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: The NEET/JEE Coaching for Tribal Students Scheme is a government initiative launched by the Rajasthan Tribal Area Development Department to provide free coaching to tribal students in the state who are preparing for the National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET) and Joint Entrance Examination (JEE).

faqs.question: What is the aim of this scheme?
faqs.answer: The aim of the scheme is to help talented tribal students in Rajasthan to get admission to prestigious medical and engineering colleges in India by providing them with high-quality coaching.

faqs.question: How can we get Free Coaching?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, the Rajasthan government has partnered with reputed coaching institutes to provide free coaching to eligible tribal students. The coaching includes intensive classroom sessions, doubt clearing sessions, study materials, and mock tests. The coaching institutes also provide guidance and mentorship to students to help them develop a better understanding of the subjects and excel in the exams.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for this scheme?
faqs.answer: To be eligible for the scheme, the student must belong to a tribal community, have passed the 12th class examination with First class.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: 1. Reimbursement of institute fees up to Rs. 55,000. 2. Provision of Rs. 1,000 per month for food and accommodation. 3. Full coverage of stationary expenses, amounting to Rs. 5,000 one-time.

faqs.question: Which documents are required to apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Education Qualification Marksheet / Certificate Copy: 12th marksheet Aadhar Card Copy: Aadhar no. Domicile Certificate Copy: TSP Certificate Jan Aadhar/Bhamashah Card Copy: ID Income Certificate Copy: Self Attested Passport Size Photo: Passport size.

faqs.question: How to apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant can apply online for the NEET/JEE Coaching for Tribal Students through website tad.rajasthan.gov.in. Application form is free for NEET/JEE Coaching for Tribal Students.
